page.title: 08FARMING
page.content: Our school Morton Park is in the middle of a very large housing estate. However the estate is situated right on the very edge of the city of Carlisle very close to open farm land. The farms in our area are all dairy farms,that is they have herds of cows which they keep for milking.The cows are almost entirely black and white Freisians.The fields around our area are all grass fields used for grazing and for growing winter feed.The farmers grow some hay for winter feed for their cattle mainly for the calves.However nowadays the farmers mostly cut the grass and make it into silage which they either keep in pits or make into large round bales.There are very few crops grown in the fields other than grass although one farm regularly grows potatoes.
